Description:
Bachelor's degree in security, criminal justice, or a related field
At least 2 years of experience in security operations or a related field
Strong knowledge of security systems, protocols, and best practices
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently, take initiative, and remain calm under pressure
Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively as part of a team
Willingness to work flexible hours and be on-call for emergencies.Job Details
